name: Deep Roots (AlexUnd3r)
description:
You are a little seed that can grow into a bigger plants or even a tree!

It's a game where you start playing as a small seed and it roots, and can grow to a big tree. Your goal is to grow and live as much as you can. Controls: You will start as a small seed, you can controll it with A/D.
By pressing "E" key you can switch between controlling roots or a plant.
Controlling roots you can use A/D to choose direction for your growth. Hints: Every time you grow, your max resources gets larger and requirements to growth as well. Rocks will slow you and waste your energy.
